description_html: The flowing curves of deck-mount FLOU 4103 faucet reflect a transition between traditional extravagance and the soft simplicity of contemporary shapes. This bath fixture features two lever handles for hot and cold, and similarly shaped spout in the center - elongated and flattened on top. This product is available in polished chrome, brushed nickel, and matte black finish. Water flow rate: 1.2 gpm with pressure compensating aerator and 90-degree ceramic cartridge heads. Overall dimensions: H: 5", SPOUT: 5 1/8".
